name: The Rhythm that Leads to the Gloomy Path

steps.plaintext: Head to the designated location to look for clues about Ashvattha's Concourses
steps.markdown: Head to the designated location to look for clues about ◀Ashvattha's Concourses▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Ashvattha%27s_Concourse▷

steps.plaintext: Observe the Sumeru Roses to find the hidden song
steps.markdown: Observe the ◀Sumeru Roses▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sumeru_Rose▷ to find the hidden song

steps.plaintext: Play the music according to the pattern of the roses
steps.markdown: Play the music according to the pattern of the roses

substeps.plaintext: You can now use the Vintage Lyre to activate Gloomy Paths.
substeps.markdown: You can now use the ◀Vintage Lyre▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Vintage_Lyre▷ to activate ◀Gloomy Paths▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Gloomy_Path▷.

steps.plaintext: Unlock the road ahead using the Rhythm of the Gloomy Path
steps.markdown: Unlock the road ahead using the Rhythm of the Gloomy Path

steps.plaintext: Enter the Gloomy Path in the woods
steps.markdown: Enter the Gloomy Path in the woods

substeps.plaintext: The Dendrograna can be found by going through the other Gloomy Paths in the Withering Zone.
substeps.markdown: The ◀Dendrograna▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dendrograna▷ can be found by going through the other Gloomy Paths in the Withering Zone.

steps.plaintext: Investigate the trees inside Ashvattha's Concourse
steps.markdown: Investigate the trees inside Ashvattha's Concourse

steps.plaintext: Talk to Arama and enter the Vasara Tree's dream
steps.markdown: Talk to Arama and enter the Vasara Tree's dream

substeps.plaintext: You will enter the quest domain The Rhythm that Leads to the Gloomy Path. If you leave before completing the quest, you must redo the entire domain from the start.
substeps.markdown: You will enter the quest domain ◀The Rhythm that Leads to the Gloomy Path▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Rhythm_that_Leads_to_the_Gloomy_Path_(Domain)▷. If you leave before completing the quest, you must redo the entire domain from the start.

substeps.plaintext: A bow user is recommended to shoot floating targets.
substeps.markdown: A bow user is recommended to shoot floating targets.

steps.plaintext: Explore the dream of the Vasara Tree
steps.markdown: Explore the dream of the Vasara Tree
